name: 丁秀儀
objective: 學生有機會學習當前投資議題，包括全球財富報告、風險與報酬、資產訂價、投資組合、投資人行為、次貸信用危機、蔓延效應、股價同漲同跌現象、股票推薦之利益衝突等議題。本課程可培養學生在投資方面的基本知識並擴展他們未來研究的視野。
schedule:
Week 1: Introduction
給投資初學者的指引
Week 2: Investor behavior
2013全球財富報告；個別投資人究竟在交易中損失多少?
Weeks 3-4: Risk and Return: Lessons from Market History
股價同漲同跌現象
Weeks 5-6: The Capital Asset Pricing Model and the Arbitrage Pricing Theory 
資產定價與投資組合
Weeks 7-8: Efficient Capital Markets and Behavioral Challenges
股票推薦之利益衝突
Week 9: Financial Crisis and Contagion
銀行財富管理業務之作業風險；次貸信用危機與蔓延效應
Week 10: Asset Classes and Financial Instruments
Weeks 11-12: Securities
Weeks 13-14: Mutual funds and other investment companies
Weeks 15-16: Fixed income securities
Week 17: Options markets
Week 18: Futures markets
materials:
Bodie, Zvi, Alex Kane, and Alan J. Marcus, Investment, 8th ed. McGraw-Hill Irwin, 2009.
Malkiel, Burton G., A Random Walk Down Wall Street, 8th edition. New York: W. W. Norton, 2004.
Bernstein, William, 投資金律(The Four Pillars of Investing: Lessons for Building a Winning Portfolio),臉譜出版, 2009.
Additional reading material will be distributed in class or posted on the class server.
